data_table.description: Anthropometry, Form ANTB, Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: ANTB01
variable.description: [Wait]. Weight (to the nearest lb). Q1 [Anthropometry Form, ANTAB, exam 2]

variable.name: ANTB02A
variable.description: [Skinfolds]. Triceps measure 1 (nearest mm). Q2a [Anthropometry Form, ANTAB, exam 2]

variable.name: ANTB02B
variable.description: [Skinfolds]. Triceps measure 2 (nearest mm). Q2b [Anthropometry Form, ANTAB, exam 2]

variable.name: ANTB03A
variable.description: [Skinfolds]. Subs caps measure 1 (nearest mm). Q3a [Anthropometry Form, ANTAB, exam 2]

variable.name: ANTB03B
variable.description: [Skinfolds]. Subs caps measure 2 (nearest mm). Q3b [Anthropometry Form, ANTAB, exam 2]

variable.name: ANTB04A
variable.description: [Body size]. Waist girth (nearest cm). Q4a [Anthropometry Form, ANTAB, exam 2]

variable.name: ANTB04B
variable.description: [Body size]. Hip girth (nearest cm). Q4b [Anthropometry Form, ANTAB, exam 2]

variable.name: ANTB05
variable.description: [Body size]. Elbow breadth (to the nearest mm). Q5 [Anthropometry Form, ANTAB, exam 2]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Anthropometry Form, ANTAB, exam 2]
